posts.post_content:
Have some PSA graded commons available for sale or trade. Would be looking for EPDG's or other graded commons that would be upgrades for me....the list is long so just shoot me a PM or email if you have anything available for trade.

Paypal Fam or money order. Anyone saying I'll take it gets priority over ongoing negotiations.  Will listen to offers if buying more than 1.

All cards are cross-listed on eBay currently.

$SOLD Ganzel PSA 5
$SOLD Krause pitching PSA 5
$SOLD Hayden PSA 2
$24 Burke PSA 2
$SOLD Demmitt St. Louis PSA 1, let's talk trade.....but will listen to offers.
